thread.title: Jason Rezaian’s phony trial could lead to prisoner swap
thread.title_full: Jason Rezaian’s phony trial could lead to prisoner swap - San Francisco Chronicle

author: San Francisco Chronicle
title: Jason Rezaian’s phony trial could lead to prisoner swap
text:
Photo: Vahid Salemi, Associated Press Reporter Jason Rez aian’s conviction casts a shadow over Iran. Reporter Jason Rez aian’s conviction casts a shadow over Iran.
The drummed-up conviction of Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian is disturbing but not surprising. The next step of either a prison sentence or prisoner swap will be telling. Reporter Jason Rez aian’s conviction casts a shadow over Iran. Reporter Jason Rez aian’s conviction casts a shadow over Iran.
